section.p: The Encounter Section contains information describing the patient history of encounters. At a minimum, current and pertinent historical encounters should be included; a full encounter history may be included.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Encounter History Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.5.3.3)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Encounter (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.16)
SHALL conform to CCD Encounters Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.3)
SHALL conform to IHE Encounter History Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.5.3.3)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="46240-8" History of encounters (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-454, CONF-455)

SHOULD contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Encounters Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.21)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Encounter (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.16)

SHOULD be valued with a case-insensitive language-insensitive text string containing 'encounters'. (CONF-457)
UNIMPLEMENTABLE
